name: Drone Combat (Beta)
description:
This is a multiplayer First-Person-Shooter game with DRONES. Which means you can fly...no joke, you can really fly. You can select the drone which you want and each of them has a specific power. Currently there are 4 maps and 2 modes (FreeForAll and Survival) to play, but there will come more updates soon : )

I dont want to spoil everything, so...good luck. I hope you enjoy it.
